song.title: Satellite suicide
song.info:
Placed second in Outline 2004 MP3 compo
[ satellite suicide ]
I'm circling the earth everything is so quiet I'm at maximum height I'm a satellite
They left me here above when the human race died now I'm here all alone all day and night
Refr.: I am so lonely here above I am so lonely here above I am so lonely here above I am so lonely
From now and then alien visitors came they scanned this place then flew away
Up here in space none of my friends remained my final wish I want to kill myself.
Refr.: I am so lonely here above I am so lonely here above I am so lonely here above I am so lonely
(c) 1998-2003 Stefan Benz
